welcome.title: Welcome to the Adventurers Guild of Remnant!
welcome.description: This is the central hub for all your adventuring needs. Here you can track your experience points (XP), gold pieces (GP), and golden tickets (GT) earned through quests and adventures. Use the commands below to manage your rewards and stay updated on your progress.

viewStatus.description: View your current XP, GP, and GT balances.

claimRewards.description: Claim rewards for completed quests or adventures.

checkGuildFund.description: Check the total GP and GT in the guild fund.

welcome.footer: Happy adventuring! May your quests be successful and your rewards plentiful.
